name: Booty Quest
description:
Ahoy matey, come aboard and join the crew of the Black Paw!

Booty Quest offers the ultimate Match 3 experience, full of pirates, puzzles and peril. Set sail from the jungles of Monkey Mountain to the chilly winds of penguin peak, as you hunt for the legendary treasures. Develop a strategy as you combine jewels to craft combos and explosions. Challenge yourself with our 6 unique game modes. Prove yourself as the fastest pirate in PvP races. Train your brain whilst digging for treasure. Put down the grog, because it’s time to defend your Ship in our revolutionary match 3 combat mode. Defeat each challenge to discover where the map leads next, unlocking new ships, boosts, and bootiful storylines.

Booty Quest is free to download, and free to play, so why don’t you give it a try today!

100s of bite-sized levels; perfect to fill the gaps in your adventures!
Collect the pieces of treasure to unlock amazing rewards!
Invite your friends and show those scurvy dogs who’s boss!
Battle it out in Global multiplayer tournaments for the chance of being crowned the Ultimate Pirate!
Our dedicated team is always creating new content for you!

“It’s a good one!” – Droid Gamers


Booty Quest is free to download and play, but contains optional in-app purchases that cost real money. If you enjoy Match 3 games, please try our other titles such as Crafty Candy and Mystery Match.



Visit https://bootyquest.zendesk.com if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;

facebook.com/BootyQuest
Twitter @BootyQuestMobile
http://Outplay.com/
